hogwart_castle.name: Gryffindor Common Room
hogwart_castle.description: A warm, cozy room for Gryffindor students, decorated with scarlet banners and a roaring fireplace.
hogwart_castle.location: Gryffindor Tower, behind the Fat Lady's portrait

hogwart_castle.name: Slytherin Common Room
hogwart_castle.description: An elegant and somewhat eerie common room, located beneath the Black Lake, with greenish light filtering through the windows.

hogwart_castle.name: Ravenclaw Common Room
hogwart_castle.description: A spacious, airy room filled with books and star charts, with a domed ceiling painted like the night sky.
hogwart_castle.location: Ravenclaw Tower, at the top of a spiral staircase

hogwart_castle.name: Hufflepuff Common Room
hogwart_castle.description: A warm, welcoming space with round doors and earthy decor, filled with plants and sunlight.
hogwart_castle.location: Near the kitchens, in the basement
